name: NU_COVID_19TestsForSARS_CoV_2ByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: NU_COVID_19 (Tests for SARS_CoV_2 by Culture and Identification Method)
description: This value set contains some provisional codes created for the COVID-19 response. It may be incomplete, as not all provisional COVID-19 codes are available in VSAC at the time of publication. Please contact the CSTE RCKMS Content Team for a complete list of codes to be included in this value set.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of SARS_CoV_2.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: SARS_CoV_2 culture; isolate),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
